name: Surfer King
description:
Full English translation version

[Synopsis]

Cheerful Johnny who surf brightly today.
But did you get tired of usual surfboards,
I try to get various waves with various things.
How far will you ride?

All 9 stages.

【Method of operation】

Space key determination, return to menu
LeftAlt key You can erase the save in a certain place, start over

↑ ← Raise the left foot

↓ ← Lower the left foot

↑ → Raise the right foot

↓ → Lower the right foot

Esc key Stops game when stage selection

[other]
For other information please read the text attached to the file.
